## TroveClosureParams type

Parameters of a [closeTrove()](./lib-base.transactablekumo.closetrove.md) transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TroveClosureParams<T> = _CollateralWithdrawal<T> & _NoCollateralDeposit & Partial<_KUSDRepayment<T>> & _NoKUSDBorrowing;
```

## Remarks

The type parameter `T` specifies the allowed value type(s) of the particular `TroveClosureParams` object's properties.
